entries.name: new(obj, uri=nil)
entries.desc: Create a new remote object stub.

entries.name: new_with(uri, ref)
entries.desc: Creates a DRb::DRbObject given the reference information to the remote host uri and object ref.

entries.name: new_with_uri(uri)
entries.desc: Create a new DRbObject from a URI alone.

entries.name: __drbref()
entries.desc: Get the reference of the object, if local.

entries.name: __drburi()
entries.desc: Get the URI of the remote object.

entries.name: respond_to?(msg_id, priv=false)
entries.desc: Routes respond_to? to the referenced remote object.
